p:testcaseDefinition.p:name: EID_SERVER_B2_1_04_NO_SIGNATURE
p:testcaseDefinition.p:description: This test case checks the behavior of the eID-Server in case the SAML message does not contain any XML signature.
p:testcaseDefinition.p:clientExplanation: Configure the server to accept the certificate chain for client E. This includes the TLS, XML signature and the CV certificate.
